name: Gluten Free Creme Brulee Pie
author: Snack Factory® Pretzel Crisps®
summary: Gluten free pretzel crumbs make a delicious crust for this classic pie.
ingredients: 2 cups Gluten Free Original Snack Factory® Pretzel Crisps® Minis crumbs
directions: Process Pretzel Crisps® into crumbs in a food processor
Transfer to a bowl and pour in melted butter; mix to combine evenly
Butter a pie dish, then press crumbs into dish to cover bottom and sides
In mixer, lightly whisk 8 egg yolks
Add heavy cream, sugar and vanilla bean seeds
Whisk on medium to incorporate air
Bake at 350 degrees F for about an hour
(If top skin is browning too quickly, use a spoon to skim it off the top and continue to bake
) Pie is finished when center appears to be set, and only jiggles slightly
Remove and cool, then place in refrigerator to cool completely
